entry.title: Mac ip forwarding
entry.content:
My mac's internet sharing is not working. After a few days of googling and fiddling with the command lines, I found a solution to fix it.
en0 is the ethernet; en1 is wifi sudo ipfw add divert natd all from any to any via en0 sudo ipfw add divert natd all from any to any via en1 sudo natd -interface en0
